thread.section_title: iPhoneIMEI.Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iPhoneIMEI.Net | iphoneimei.net | 4 of 88
thread.title: Philip Caplan

author: Philip Caplan
title: Philip Caplan
text:
As with many other reviewers, I was concerned as to the reliability etc of the company. There was an indication from trust pilot when I read the reviews that some negative ones had been removed and this was being monitored.
Everything went very smoothly except, for the particular phone and carrier by the price for the unlocking of the phone there was a Quote: d time of 24 to 48 hours. Time ticked by and I heard nothing, but looking further at the details for the particular carrier I saw that the Quote: d time there was 5 to 7 days. This was the only complaint I could have that the time processing differed depending where you looked!
However, the phone was unlocked within about60 hours so well within the longer Quote: and everything is fine.
There would be a five star rating, were it not for the confusing details regarding processing time.
